actors.name: Úrsula Corberó
actors.bio: Úrsula Corberó plays Tokyo, the narrator of the series who is known for her impulsive and reckless nature.

actors.name: Álvaro Morte
actors.bio: Álvaro Morte portrays The Professor, the mastermind behind the heist who manages to keep one step ahead of the authorities.

actors.name: Itziar Ituño
actors.bio: Itziar Ituño plays Raquel Murillo, a police inspector who eventually joins the gang after falling in love with The Professor.

actors.name: Pedro Alonso
actors.bio: Pedro Alonso plays Berlin, a key member of the gang known for his leadership qualities and complex moral code.
